ygData.subject: Re: Old Question -- Has JM or anyone official ever answered it? Jig a nd Mana
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, the tests I have seen described were not very rigorous in the testing process. For instance, testing the time to full up a bubble at the beginning
ygData.messageBody:
>Does the Jig really effect Mana regen rate? I still haven't been able to do
>any scientific experimentation, and I know that while this was discussed
>pretty heavily a while back, I'm not sure I ever saw any sort of definitive
>answer come from it, just theories about stamina and meditation being on the
>same pulse rate.
>
>Anyone done any hard studies? Or did JM answer this in a post I missed
>while on vacation?


Well, the tests I have seen described were not very rigorous in the testing process. For instance,
testing the time to full up a bubble at the beginning against a bubble near the end is not a good
test. We don't know if there are variances in how the mana graphic is displayed or if there are
different regen rates at different levels. Anyway, I AM hoping to find the definitive word on this,
based on imperic evidence or just J.M.C.s word *smiles*

Tszaaz
